The patient history , concurrent , clinically significant illness , medical condition ( arthritis ) laboratory abnormality , Investigator 's opinion , could affect conduct study . Specifically , exclude patient follow : 1. unresolved Grade 2 great toxicity RA protocol study R788 2. uncontrolled poorly control hypertension ; 3. recent ( within past 2 month ) serious surgery infectious disease ; 4. recent history ( since enrollment prior R788 study ) , treatment , malignancy nonmelanomatous skin cancer , history lymphoma ; 5. know positive Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV Tuberculosis ; 6. interstitial pneumonitis active pulmonary infection ; 7. know laboratory abnormality : ALT > 1.2 x ULN , creatinine > 1.5x ULN , ANC < 2,500/mm3 2.5 x 109/L , lymphocyte count < 600/mm3 0.6 x 109L , Hgb < 9 g/dL 5 mmol/L , platelet count < 125,000/mm3 125 x 109/L exclude . The patient history substance abuse , drug addiction alcoholism . Patients may consume 4 unit alcohol per week ; however , alcohol avoid 72 hour prior lab assessment . Patients reliably comply exclude . A unit alcohol define follow : Beer = 12 oz 355 mL ; wine = 5 oz 148 mL ; sweet dessert wine = 3 oz 89 mL ; 80 proof distil spirit = 1.5 oz 44 mL .
